simple.heading: Article 01
simple.text: All people are born free and equal.

simple.heading: Article 02
simple.text: Everyone is entitled to all the rights and freedoms in the Declaration of Human Rights.

simple.heading: Article 03
simple.text: Everyone has the right to a free and safe life.

simple.heading: Article 04
simple.text: No one should be enslaved; slavery should be prohibited.

simple.heading: Article 05
simple.text: No one should be subjected to torture.

simple.heading: Article 06
simple.text: Everyone has the right to be recognized as a person before the law.

simple.heading: Article 07
simple.text: Everyone is equal before the law and are entitled to equal protection.

simple.heading: Article 08
simple.text: Everyone has the right to compensation for acts violating their fundamental human rights.

simple.heading: Article 09
simple.text: No one should be arbitrarily arrested, detained, or exiled.

simple.heading: Article 10
simple.text: Everyone is entitled a fair and public hearing by an independent and impartial tribunal.

simple.heading: Article 11
simple.text: Everyone is innocent until proven guilty.

simple.heading: Article 12
simple.text: Everyone is entitled to their privacy.

simple.heading: Article 13
simple.text: Everyone has the right to freedom of residence and movement.

simple.heading: Article 14
simple.text: Everyone is entitled to seek and enjoy asylum from persecution.

simple.heading: Article 15
simple.text: Everyone has the right to a nationality.

simple.heading: Article 16
simple.text: Everyone has the right to marriage if both parties are fully consenting; they shall be protected by society and the State.

simple.heading: Article 17
simple.text: Everyone has the right to own property.

simple.heading: Article 18
simple.text: Everyone has the right to the freedom of thought, conscience, and religion.

simple.heading: Article 19
simple.text: Everyone has the right to freedom of opinion and expression.

simple.heading: Article 20
simple.text: Everyone has the right to peaceful assembly

simple.heading: Article 21
simple.text: Everyone has the right to participate in government equally.

simple.heading: Article 22
simple.text: Everyone has a right to social security.

simple.heading: Article 23
simple.text: Everyone has the right to work in just conditions; with equal pay for equal work; and the right to form and join trade unions.

simple.heading: Article 24
simple.text: Everyone has the right to rest and leisure.

simple.heading: Article 25
simple.text: Everyone has the right to a standard of living adequate for health and well-being.

simple.heading: Article 26
simple.text: Everyone has a right to education.

simple.heading: Article 27
simple.text: Everyone has the right to participate in the cultural life of the community.

simple.heading: Article 28
simple.text: Everyone is entitled to the freedoms within this Declaration.

simple.heading: Article 29
simple.text: The only limits to rights and freedoms are subject to laws that respect the rights and freedoms declared in this document.

simple.heading: Article 30
simple.text: Nothing in this Declaration should be aimed at the destruction of any of the rights or freedoms.
